messages.subject: hello!
messages.msgSnippet: i am mama to meghan who is now 5.5 yo and sheamas who is now 6 mos. old...  i have had meghan in a waldorf mixed age kindergarten as i much needed a break
messages.messageBody:
i am mama to meghan who is now 5.5 yo and sheamas who is now 6 mos.
old... i have had meghan in a waldorf mixed age kindergarten as i much
needed a break postpartum (i'm also a single mother/solo parent) and
wanted her to be in a nurturing environment. i have been very
disappointed in this school/education. i will go into it in another
post as my children have fallen asleep on the couch and one on my
lap...and i am tired as well... but i wanted to say hi, let you know i
just joined and am thinking about unschooling my dc once again...that
was my plan for a long while...then i thought i'd waldorf school my
dd...now i'm reconsidering after having a bad taste in my mouth for how
teachers/assistants interact w/ my daughter. more on that later...i
want to make sure megh has a constancy in her life of regular
friendships as i worry for her...she is very social and loves to be
playing w/ other children. there is a local group here of unschoolers
so i'll probably rejoin them.
more soon. good to be here. i have many questions...
lisbeth in central oregon
